reason: The market appears to be in an Accumulation phase for Bitcoin. Despite recent gains and a recovery from lows, 'extreme fear' still dominates, and 'panic premium' lingers in options. This suggests that while smart money may be accumulating, retail investors remain fearful, indicating potential for continued volatility or retests of support levels. Mixed altcoin performance (AAVE falling, AZTEC surging) further highlights capital rotation and uncertainty beyond Bitcoin.
headlines: CoinDesk 20 performance update: AAVE falls 3.3%, leading index lower
What next for XRP as volatility sinks to 2024 lows
Bitcoin gains, is still 'signficantly undervalued,' Bitwise says. 'Extreme fear' dominates.
Dual South Korean listings send Ethereum layer-2 token AZTEC surging 82%
